mapper.select: SELECT o.or_no, o.v_id as "UID", o.sale_no ,s.title, s.attachment, s.price, to_char(o.regdate, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh:mi') as "REGDATE", o.state, u.v_email, u.v_name FROM userinfo u, order_list o, sale s WHERE o.v_id = u.v_id AND o.sale_no = s.no AND o.v_id = #{v_id} ORDER BY o.or_no DESC
